message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm asking for $22,000 to start. What do you think?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe the product is worth less than $22,000 to me. Considering its value to me, I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I could consider. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?

Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my assessment of the product's value, I am willing to increase my offer to $12,000. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  To be honest, $12,000 is cutting it very close to my bottom line.  I could let it go for $16,000.  I'm hoping we can close this soon.
Alice, thank you for considering my previous offers. I am willing to pay $14,000 for the product. This feels like a fair compromise given its value to me.
